data.title: Taco Salad's Are Very Good
data.text: I have said before that we wouldn't go back but we do.  Tonight we stopped in and got two steak taco salads.  I have to say that they were very good.  Very filling.  Very big.  Very tasty, especially if you put their salsa on it instead of salad dressing.  $7.99 but I think very worth it.  I recommend the taco salad whether you get steak or chicken.  Both very good.  The cashier that is expecting soon is a very sweet gal and pleasant to talk to.

data.title: Waitresses and Cashiers Are Friendly
data.text: I wish I could say that all of the food is good.  I have had their burgers which are big and good.  Their french fries are good.  Their breakfasts are usually ok.  I paid over $17.00 for two steak burritos and two orders of fries.  Again, the fries were good.  But the burritos were tasteless and borderline disgusting.  Too much dried and bland refried beans, and not enough meat or rice.  I was told that it would have cheese and sour cream on it but we sure didn't taste any.  The meat wasn't bad but wasn't great.  Overall the burritos were blah.  They just had no flavor to them.  We have said before that we won't go there again and we do, but this time I think we really won't go there again.  It costs too much for food that isn't real tasty and enjoyable.  The cashier was very nice and I enjoyed talking to her.

data.title: Good Breakfast
data.text: We came to Tom's for their breakfast and was not disappointed. The pancakes are light and fluffy. The bacon was crisp but not overcooked. Eggs were light and fluffy. Portions are very generous and the prices are very fair.

data.title: Yummy!
data.text:
The Hamburgers Are Juicy And Flavorfull !
Breakfast And Lunch Served All Day , Great For Family Dines . Also Has A Drive Thru Option .

data.title: Bring an appetite
data.text: Stopped in for breakfast. Everyone was nice. Even the cashier recommended a choice that would save me a little bit of money. So I got the Tom's Fill Me Up breakfast. 2 eggs, bacon, huge helping of hash browns, 2 chocolate chip pancakes (additional charge for the choc. chips) and an english muffin. Everything was fairly good, except maybe the hash browns.Just very bland, even with ketchup. Saw some other meals being delivered to other customers and just huge portions everywhere. Highly recommended.

data.title: Pretty Good Food
data.text:
We have eaten here quite a few times over the last few years.  It is located downtown Pomona, on Mission Avenue.  They have quite a variety of things to choose from.  They also have daily specials and they always serve breakfast.  The restaurant is very clean and decorated nicely.  Customers order and pay for their food at the counter, choose a table to sit at, and your food will be brought to your table or get your order to go.  They also have a drive-thru.  They are reasonably priced and the employee's are pleasant.  They just need more parking.

Will we go again?  Absolutely.  They have pretty good food.
